div.a: Read More about Previous COVID-19 School Closure Announcements

tr.td: Carbondale Community High School was recently named one of America's best high schools for 2019 by U. S. News and World Report. This is the 8th consecutive year that CCHS has achieved this honor. You can see U. S. News and World Report's complete summary by clicking here.
CCHS was named one of America's best high schools by Newsweek. You can read Newsweek's findings here.
